boat.name: Nomad
boat.full_description:
Designed by Ed Burnet and Nigel Irens and built by Fairlie Restorations on the Hamble in 1997, 'Nomad' spent her early years in New Zealand and Australia before being transported back to the UK.

Her second owner, Dutch Olympic sailor Boudewijin Binkhorst, moved her to Holland and cared for her over 19 years, increasing the sail area and installing a larger engine.

She was purchased by new owners in 2017, who brought her back to the UK where she will join the Solent Gaffers, based in Poole.
boat.construction_details: Woodepoxy construction, wood mast, carbon gaff and boom
boat.short_description: Designed by Ed Burnet and Nigel Irens and built by Fairlie Restorations on the Hamble in 1997, 'Nomad' was transported to New Zealand and then sailed to Australia.
